QuestData.Title: Seeking Haven
QuestData.Description:
I am at a loss.
We have no way to follow Zovaal and Anduin. I'll open a portal back to Haven. We will discuss our next steps there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Haven with Jaina and Baine.
QuestData.RewardText: We will look into how to follow them into the Sepulcher. Until then, you should focus your efforts on more immediate issues.
